column6:
The seeds of Ms. Marvel's upcoming new status quo are planted here! Killer robots! Contagious zombies! Impatient teen side-kicks! Could it get any worse for Carol Danvers? You bet - because as our heroine battles the cybernetic psychopath known as the Doomsday Man, she learns a terrifying truth about herself! All this, plus Araña and Wonder Man! Writer Brian Reed (New Avengers: Illuminati) and penciler Roberto De La Torre welcome onboard new cover artist Greg Horn (She-Hulk) - and get you ready for next month's new era!,2007,2
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Roberto Delatorre | penciller (cover):Greg Horn | writer:Brian Reed | letterer:Dave Sharpe | inker:Jonathan Sibal | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
